title: The Terror
resume: Anthology series.Season 1: The story of a British Royal Navy ship’s perilous voyage into unchartered territory as its crew attempts to discover the Northwest Passage. Faced with treacherous conditions, limited resources, dwindling hope and fear of the unknown, the crew is pushed to the brink of extinction. Frozen, isolated and stuck at the end of the earth, a group of men, desperate to survive, struggle not only with the elements, but with each other.Season 2 is set during World War II and center on an uncanny specter that menaces a Japanese-American community from its home in Southern California to the internment camps to the war in the Pacific.
